name: Escape From Isekia
description:
Escape From Isekia is a small space system with three objectives to complete in order to escape. I was interested in doing a game with the gameboy colour pallet. Any feedback or questions just lemme know! Have fun out there space cowboy.

Controls:

Movement: WAD

Ship rotation: Q, E, R, F

Afterburners: Shift

Guns: Left Click
